chapters.name: Crop Production and Management
key_topics: Soil preparation, sowing, manuring and irrigation
Harvesting, storage and protection from pests
learning_outcomes: Lists major steps of crop production in sequence.
Explains need for manure, fertilisers and proper irrigation.

chapters.name: Microorganisms: Friend and Foe
key_topics: Types of microorganisms (bacteria, fungi, protozoa, viruses)
Use in food, medicine and industry
Diseases and food spoilage caused by microbes
learning_outcomes: Classifies microorganisms with examples.
Explains both helpful and harmful roles of microbes.

chapters.name: Synthetic Fibres and Plastics
key_topics: Types of synthetic fibres (rayon, nylon, polyester, acrylic)
learning_outcomes: Differentiates between natural and synthetic fibres.
Discusses advantages and environmental problems of plastics.

chapters.name: Materials: Metals and Non-metals
chapters.theme: Properties and uses of metals and non-metals
key_topics: Chemical properties (reaction with air, water, acids)
learning_outcomes: Compares metals and non-metals using experiments.
Matches material properties with suitable uses.

chapters.name: Coal and Petroleum
learning_outcomes: Explains why coal and petroleum are exhaustible resources.
Lists steps to reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

chapters.name: Combustion and Flame
key_topics: Good and bad fuels; fuel efficiency
learning_outcomes: Identifies zones of a candle flame and their properties.
Discusses safe handling of fuels and fire.

chapters.name: Conservation of Plants and Animals
key_topics: Protected areas (wildlife sanctuaries, national parks, biosphere reserves)
Red Data Book and endemic species
learning_outcomes: Explains effects of deforestation on environment.
Describes role of protected areas in conservation.

chapters.name: Cell â€“ Structure and Functions
key_topics: Discovery of cell and cell theory (intuitive)
Differences between plant and animal cells
learning_outcomes: Identifies major cell parts in diagrams.
Differentiates between typical plant and animal cells.

chapters.name: Reproduction in Animals
key_topics: Sexual reproduction: male and female reproductive systems
learning_outcomes: Explains basic steps of sexual reproduction in humans (age-appropriate).
Classifies animals based on mode of birth.

chapters.name: Reaching the Age of Adolescence
key_topics: Health, hygiene and balanced diet during adolescence
learning_outcomes: Recognises physical and emotional changes at puberty as natural.
Lists healthy habits important during adolescence.

chapters.name: Force and Pressure
key_topics: Pressure and its dependence on area
learning_outcomes: Gives examples of different types of forces.
Explains everyday situations using concept of pressure.

chapters.name: Friction
chapters.theme: Friction as a force and its effects
learning_outcomes: Identifies situations where friction is useful or undesirable.
Suggests ways to increase or reduce friction as needed.

chapters.name: Sound
key_topics: Propagation of sound through different media
learning_outcomes: Explains how sound is produced in common instruments.
Relates pitch and loudness to characteristics of vibration.

chapters.name: Chemical Effects of Electric Current
learning_outcomes: Differentiates between conductors and non-conductors among liquids.
Describes simple applications of electroplating.

chapters.name: Some Natural Phenomena
learning_outcomes: Explains lightning as a large electric discharge.
Lists safety measures during lightning and earthquakes.

chapters.name: Light
chapters.theme: Reflection, refraction basics and human eye (intro)
learning_outcomes: Describes reflection from smooth and rough surfaces.
Explains simple use of mirrors in daily life and devices.

chapters.name: Stars and the Solar System
learning_outcomes: Names planets in order from the Sun.
Explains cause of lunar phases qualitatively.

chapters.name: Pollution of Air and Water
key_topics: Sources of air and water pollution
learning_outcomes: Identifies major pollutants and their sources.
Suggests individual and community actions to reduce pollution.
